page.title: 14Black Bridge
page.content: Black Bridge consists of a bridge and an old house called Black Brig Cottage. The bridge is very old and has a very small burn running under it. The bridge is just wide enough for a car to get over it. The house too, is very old and small. Round about the house and bridge there are a few trees. The cottage is surrounded by a huge hedge which has an opening to get in. The bridge has not got a date on it but we think it is very old and has been there for a while. The bridge has a very small opening just big enough for the water to flow through. There is a road that goes past the house. It is used quite a lot although it is only a small road.
